p: The Fig 10 results join a substantial list of other studies and datasets where education×politics or similar interaction effects are reported.[ 14][ 17][ 30][ 36][ 37][ 38][ 39][ 40][ 41][ 42][ 43] The “right-facing megaphone” shape of polarization widening with education, as seen in Fig 10A, 10B and 10D, reflects a pervasive reality of current US politics.
